    • btnHandlerB

      void btnHandlerB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the user clicks the "Buy" button. Retrieves the selected item from the ListView, updates its count, and reflects the changes in the UI and data file.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Buy" button.

    • updateTextFile

      private void updateTextFile(Long serialNumber, String name, String brand, Double price, int count, int ageAppropriate, String category)
      Removes the selected item from the ListView and updates the data file accordingly.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the toy to be removed.
      name - The name of the toy to be removed.
      brand - The brand of the toy to be removed.
      price - The price of the toy to be removed.
      count - The count of the toy to be removed.
      ageAppropriate - The age appropriateness of the toy to be removed.
      category - The category of the toy to be removed.

    • btnHandlerC

      void btnHandlerC(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Clears the ListView and resets the text fields and radio buttons to their default state.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Clear" button.

    • btnHandler

      void btnHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the user clicks the "Display" button. Filters the toy data based on user input and updates the ListView accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Display" button.

    • filterAndDisplayResults

      private void filterAndDisplayResults()
      Filters the toy data based on user input and updates the ListView with the results.

    • matchesCriteria

      private boolean matchesCriteria(Toy toy, String searchTerm, String searchSerialNumber, String searchType)
      Checks if the given toy matches the specified criteria based on user input.
      Parameters:
      toy - The toy to be checked.
      searchTerm - The search term for toy name.
      searchSerialNumber - The search term for toy serial number.
      searchType - The search term for toy brand/type.
      Returns:
      True if the toy matches the criteria, false otherwise.

    • formatToy

      private String formatToy(Toy toy)
      Formats the toy information for display in the ListView.
      Parameters:
      toy - The toy to be formatted.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the toy information.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the application by loading data from the specified file.

    • loadDataFromFile

      private List<Toy> loadDataFromFile()
      Loads toy data from the specified file and returns a list of Toy objects.
      Returns:
      A list of Toy objects loaded from the file.

    • isBoardgame

      private boolean isBoardgame(long serialNumber)
      Determines if the given serial number corresponds to a BoardGame based on the first digit.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the serial number corresponds to a BoardGame, false otherwise.

    • isFigure

      private boolean isFigure(long serialNumber)
      Determines if the given serial number corresponds to a Figure based on the first digit.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the serial number corresponds to a Figure, false otherwise.

    • isAnimal

      private boolean isAnimal(long serialNumber)
      Determines if the given serial number corresponds to an Animal based on the first digit.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if the serial number corresponds to an Animal, false otherwise.

    • isPuzzle

      private boolean isPuzzle(long serialNumber)
      Determines if the given serial number corresponds to a Puzzle based on the first digit.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the serial number corresponds to a Puzzle, false otherwise.
